title: It’s New 2/2: Google AI reports, no comment on volatility, endorsements on Google Ads, ChatGPT ads

tactics.name: Schema Markup for LocalBusiness
tactics.description: Implement structured data to enhance visibility in local search results and SERP features.
steps: Create JSON-LD schema for LocalBusiness type
Include geo coordinates and business details
caveats: Requires consistent NAP (Name, Address, Phone) across platforms
source_quotes: "John Mueller said the web is dynamic... recommend digging deep into details."

tactics.name: Local Pack Ad Optimization
tactics.description: Prioritize high-intent keywords for local pack ads to capitalize on increased ad visibility and user engagement.
steps: Target seasonal keywords with high local search volume
caveats: Avoid over-optimization leading to spammy results
source_quotes: "There was a pretty outrageous chart... January of 22% of those keywords had ads in the local pack."

heuristics.name: Schema Markup Presence Check
heuristics.condition: If schema markup exists for LocalBusiness, then boost relevance
source_quotes: "Nothing in search is ever permanent... things are always changing."

heuristics.name: Local Intent Signal Check
heuristics.condition: If a keyword shows a 15%+ increase in local pack ads, prioritize it for location pages
source_quotes: "There was a pretty outrageous chart... January of 22% of those keywords had ads in the local pack."

claims.statement: Schema markup for LocalBusiness is a ranking factor for local SEO
source_quotes: "Google has no comment on volatility... but schema is critical."

claims.statement: Local pack ad visibility increased from 6.5% to 22% of keywords between July 2024 and January 2025
source_quotes: "There was a pretty outrageous chart... January of 22% of those keywords had ads in the local pack."

niche_patterns.description: Target specific services with hyper-local keywords to align with user intent
niche_patterns.why_it_works: High intent queries with low competition for niche location keywords
source_quotes: "Endorsements in ads may boost CTR... but location specificity is key."

niche_patterns.example: plumbing services in Austin TX during winter
niche_patterns.description: Combine location-based keywords with seasonal intent to capture time-sensitive local searches
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Aligns with Google's increased local pack ad visibility for high-intent queries
source_quotes: "There was a pretty outrageous chart... January of 22% of those keywords had ads in the local pack."
